title: Creating Digital Constitutional Rights Amendment
description: protocol creates new forms of governance and rights; constitutional recognition would strengthen legitimacy; I propose national constitutional amendment... (10 steps total)
content:
Given protocol creates new forms of governance and rights
And constitutional recognition would strengthen legitimacy
When I propose national constitutional amendment
Then I recognize: sortition governance as legitimate democratic form
